Introduction
This resource is the observation section Mammography Associated Features.
This profile contains references to multiple sub-observation pieces of this observation..
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of:
what resources reference Mammography Associated Features
what resources Mammography Associated Features references
Review Status
NotReviewed Comments and Suggested changes to this implementation guide van be made here
Member Observations
The following are parts of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources.
The reference to each external observation is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.
'Mammography Architectural Distortion' reference [0..*]
'Mammography Axillary Adenopathy' reference [0..1]
'Mammography Calcification' reference [0..*]
'Mammography Nipple Retraction' reference [0..1]
'Mammography Skin Retraction' reference [0..1]
'Mammography Skin Thickening' reference [0..*]
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
